languagesAndFrameworks.name: html
languagesAndFrameworks.description: The HyperText Markup Language or HTML is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.

languagesAndFrameworks.name: css
languagesAndFrameworks.description: Cascading Style Sheets is a style sheet language used for describing the presentation of a document written in a markup language such as HTML or XML.

languagesAndFrameworks.name: bootstrap
languagesAndFrameworks.description: Bootstrap is a free front-end framework for faster and easier web development.

languagesAndFrameworks.name: sass
languagesAndFrameworks.description: Sass is a preprocessor scripting language that is interpreted or compiled into Cascading Style Sheets.

languagesAndFrameworks.name: tailwind
languagesAndFrameworks.description: A utility-first CSS framework that can be composed to build any design, directly in your markup.

languagesAndFrameworks.name: javascript
languagesAndFrameworks.description: JavaScript is an scripting language used both on the client-side and server-side that allows you to make web pages interactive.

languagesAndFrameworks.name: react
languagesAndFrameworks.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces based on UI components.

languagesAndFrameworks.name: vue
languagesAndFrameworks.description: Vue.js is a JavaScript framework for building user interfaces. It builds on top of standard HTML, CSS and JavaScript, and provides a declarative and component-based programming model that helps you efficiently develop user interfaces, be it simple or complex.

languagesAndFrameworks.name: next
languagesAndFrameworks.description: Next.js is an open-source web development framework built on top of Node.js enabling React-based web applications functionalities such as server-side rendering and generating static websites.

languagesAndFrameworks.name: php
languagesAndFrameworks.description: PHP is a general-purpose scripting language geared toward web development.

languagesAndFrameworks.name: laravel
languagesAndFrameworks.description: Laravel is a web application framework with expressive, elegant syntax. We’ve already laid the foundation — freeing you to create without sweating the small things.
